SEO_DESCRIPTION: Accommodations in Altea with free Wi-Fi and mountain views.

FEATURES.TITLE: Enjoy the Natural Beauty of the Costa Blanca
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: These holiday homes are located in the beautiful town of Altea, Spain. They offer free Wi-Fi and mountain views. The nearest beach is just 3 km and a 5 minute drive away.

BARAHONA.TITLE: Casa Barahona
BARAHONA.CONTENT: This spacious holiday home features 4 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, 2 bathrooms with a bath, a washing machine and a fireplace. Guests can enjoy the ambience of the surroundings, an outdoor dining area and a private pool.

BAHORUCO.TITLE: Casa Bahoruco
BAHORUCO.CONTENT: This cozy holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven and a bathroom. Guests can enjoy the shared outdoor dining area and the communal pool.

BOHECHIO.TITLE: Casa Bohechio
BOHECHIO.CONTENT: This cozy holiday home features a bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a bathroom and a fireplace. Guests can enjoy the shared outdoor dining area and the communal pool.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: This is what our customers have to say about our holiday homes:

FAQ.TITLE: Explore the Area
FAQ.TITLE2: We've got the answers you need:

CONTENT.title: How many bedrooms does these homes have?
CONTENT.content: Casa Barahona: Four bedrooms and two bathrooms. | Casa Bahoruco: Two bedrooms and one bathroom. | Casa Bohecio: One bedroom and one bathroom.

CONTENT.title: How far are these homes from the center of Altea?
CONTENT.content: It's 3km away from the center of Altea.

CONTENT.title: What are the check-in and check-out times?
CONTENT.content: Check-in is from 5:00 PM until 8:00 PM and check-out is from 8:00 AM until 11:00 AM.

CONTENT.title: What activities are prohibited in these homes?
CONTENT.content: Bachelors parties, stag parties, hen parties and other similar events are not allowed.

CONTENT.title: Is there a refundable damage deposit?
CONTENT.content: A damage deposit of 300€ (200€ in case of Casa Bahoruco/Bohecio) is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full, in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
